name: A Snake In Time
description:
Use WASD    to navigate the snake

Collect points      in the level to fill up the gauge to rewind time  

Collect hourglasses    to restock on snake's time slow ability. Max 3 can be collected at a time. Press shift to use the time slow ability

Remember such power comes with a cost. With each death, the snake's time slow ability becomes more costly. Use it wisely.
